security.title: Zero-Knowledge Security
security.description: Your data stays private. We use zero-knowledge methodology to ensure your personal or financial information is never exposed. No registration needed, no personal info or keys stored. Your WALLET is your access method.

education.title: Financial Education
education.description: Because financial education creates security and peace of mind, our mission is to offer the best e-learning platforms. Access courses, videos, tutorials and expert financial advice to optimize your investments.

fees.title: Transparent Fees
fees.description: Simple fee structure with no hidden costs. Clear, transparent and low fees to optimize your savings and maximize your returns.

about.title: About Ethernal
about.description: We are dedicated to helping you CALCULATE, CREATE and SELF-MANAGE your Personal Decentralized Retirement Fund, so you can build a solid, secure future tailored to your needs. With a focus on privacy, security and self-management, our Smart Contracts are designed to give you peace of mind and transparency. Your data is protected with Zero-Knowledge methodology, ensuring your personal, sensitive and financial information remains PRIVATE.
about.protocolDescription: Ethernal Fund is a decentralized protocol that allows anyone to create and self-manage a personal retirement fund on the blockchain. Built with a privacy-first philosophy using zero-knowledge methodology — your wallet is your identity, no registration or personal data required.

principles.zeroKnowledge: Zero-Knowledge Security — no personal data stored, wallet is your access method
principles.selfManaged: Self-Managed Funds — deploy your own PersonalFund smart contract
principles.transparentFees: Transparent Fees — simple, low, and visible fee structure on-chain
principles.multiLanguage: Multi-language — English, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German
principles.calculator: Retirement Calculator — plan your future contributions and projections
